title: Gamebreaking bug - Can't open shop

embed.description: This game sucked. Fully closing the game and restarting did not help.

body:
Just copying my bug report from the Reddit megathread. Any help would be greatly appreciated. I can't play like this.

- **Server:**  OCE

- **Type of Bug:** Can't open shop in ARAM.

- **Description:** I cannot open the shop. I have checked my keybinds (It was as expected). I have clicked the shop button on the UI and I have clicked the shopkeeper. All three ways of opening the shop just expanded my champ stats next to my portait in the new UI.

- **Video / Screenshot:** [Video of my trying top open the shop window.](https://youtu.be/H8GKUdhWwcE) You can see me clicking the shop and stats opening.

- **Steps to reproduce:** Attempt to open shop.

- **Expected result:** Shop window opens.

- **Observed result:** Get expanded stats.

- **Reproduction rate:** 100% for this game. Wasn't happening earlier. Restarting game did not fix. Just opened a custom Summoner's Rift as Graves. Same problem. Looks like I can't play League...


**Edit:** Restarted my computer, same probelm. Game is literally unplayable.

replies.body:
After searching for the answer i might have found it on youtube:

"I fixed the problem finally. It only took me 3 hours to find a post on a forum. 
It turns out if you change resolution from Eyefinity (3 monitors) back to 1 and you kept the store open on one of the other screens then it will stay on the screen even if you don't have it plunged in or even at the resolution. The fix to the problem is changing the resolution to get it back again. Simple as thatï»¿"
~FoxyBrea

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y9k7M49MOWk
SO yeah, basicly set your resolution to something else for a second.
Same problem, and reinstall didnt fixed it. Repairing now.
Upgraded to windows 10(from 8.1), problem still presists, this is getting annoying.

Repair didnt fix it either.

The game is unplayable till this tis fixed

Hi Jack023,

Thanks for raising this.

Can you attach your game logs from one of these games to this post?  If you installed to a default location, they should be under "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Game - R3d Logs"

Thanks
Mindstar

I added some of the last few. the first I think was the ARAM game from the video (guessing from the timestamp on the file) The other two are both custom games to check if the bug persisted (it did) before I went into another game. I quit out of both the custom games after a minute or so. I don't have any other full games from today (obviously because I am basically useless without items).

Any idea on a fix? I would really like to play so this is super frustrating.

Thanks mate - will pass them on.

For getting things working again, I'd try and [repair your game files](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq6) - it is possible something got messed up during/after the patch.

If that doesn't work I'd also try and do a [full reinstall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) - just to be sure.

Cheers
Mindstar
Repair did nothing but a reinstall seemed to fix it.
